ratingsByFeature.title: Ratings by Features
ratingsByFeature.info: Overall Rating & parameter wise rating has been calculated taking into account quality, quantity & recency of reviews

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: This locality is not very heavily populated. The roads are well done and the crossover from one side of the road to the other  between building societies located across the multi barreled roads requires U-turns after travelling long distances,and because it is not a densely populated area get away driving on the wrong side sometimes, but no one seems overly concerned about that just yet because there ample space for everyone to move aboutwith ease despite this, The area around sector 78 is connecteb by a metro line, and  the Metro station is with easy reach of most building societies there. The residents have access to facilities  such Atms, Banks, a Hospital and a reputed school within very short distances, eg:ICICC Bank atm, one of the nearest landmarks is located within a  distance of 0.6 km. There are only frequent power cuts.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: in the locality in night there is the not much safe for girls th late night. There is also parking issues, In this area sometimes the traffic becomes become more and the people stuck in traffic for more minutes. There is not too much police petrolling, There is also water scarcity in these locality, water scarcity is a common problem. There are not street lights are there.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review:
Sector 78 Noida is one of the high tech and very clean locality in comparison to the other localities.
Very convenient place for the workers,as it is located near to the yamuna express way and Greater noida expressway.
Plenty of housing available from low rate to high rate, grocery shops , malls , hospitals facilities are near the locality.
Lots of park are available where you can spend your time with your family or friends. Water reliability and electricity connection are also well maintained in the locality.
Overall it is a good and peaceful place to live.
Too much traffic and congestion and street lights are also not there.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review:
Power cut outs  is the major issue sometimes in the locality .
If you any crime happens against you , the police station is far away from the locality.
water scarcity is also the problem sometime in the society.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: Noida Sector 78 is a convenient place for IT workers, has excellent connectivity, and is also close to many business centers. Well-developed locality with reliable electricity and water supplies. Even at night, Sector 78 is almost safe. It has Wide roads, shopping malls, hospitals etc. I really enjoyed the vibrant environment when I was living there.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Even though the connectivity is good, its limited. You can expect some noise and air pollution in some areas. Traffic congestion is there. and in monsoon season, congestion increases more and more. Also, the cost of living will be slightly higher in this vibrant environment.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: I am living here for last 6 years. I am so happy with this place. The area where I live is well connected. A metro stations nearby and a bus stop in 1 minute walking distance. I feel very secure here because of very near police station and city hospital. A city center is also present. I am living here very happily with my family.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: The only thing that disappoint me is that there is no parks and playgrounds nearby. The environment is also much polluted. Facing daily traffic jam. And frequent power cut is also and issue.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review:
1. Sector 78 is located close to major arterial roads such as the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway and Yamuna Expressway.
2. The locality has good social infrastructure with schools, hospitals and shopping centers.
3. Sector 78 has several green areas making it great place to live for those who value natural surroundings.
4. There are plenty of housing options available in Sector 78 ranging from affordable apartments to luxury villas, catering to different budgets and preferences.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review:
1. Like most areas in Noida, traffic congestion can be a problem during peak hours.
2. Water scarcity is a common issue faced by residents in Sector 78.
3. The locality is closed to a few industrial areas , which may lead to noise pollution at times.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review:
This area is one of the commercial and high-tech areas of Noida. This is very clean area. Roads are 
well-maintained. There are lots of park where people can feel fresh and children can play games.
Metro connectivity are nearby available. This area is safe and Police patrolling frequently. There are no Electricity power cuts.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: Dislikes about this locality  are too much traffic jams due to too much no of vehicles. Air Pollution can be also a factor for dislike, you have to wear masks in festivals seasons due to low quality air and air pollution. This area is safe but if you are a girl then you have to little aware in mid nights when you are outside. Cab drivers are looted and charged too much money for short distance when they know you are new city.

tuples.title: Positives
tuples.review: I think societies situated in a manstream area of Noida transport service is good women security and child security is very good you can take a metro and bus and cab all the services available on there thank you.

tuples.title: Negatives
tuples.review: My concern about locality is the power cut and park for children is not available near.not ample space for children. And also there are some factories which is also spred pollution

pointers.title: Sector-78 Noida is an upscale housing hub dominated by 3 BHK residential apartments in the premium budget segment
Nearest metro stations are Sector-76 and Sector-101 on Noida Metro's Aqua Line, connecting to Greater Noida
Sector-78 Noida offers many high street commercial shops and restaurants within its periphery
About 10 km from prime commercial hubs located in Sector-62, Sector-63 and Sector-81 via Vishwakarma Road
Competitive rentals and quick access to the city's leading employment hubs propel rental demand in Sector-78 Noida
Local autos, feeder buses and e-rickshaws are available in this sector, making the commute easier
Popular developers in Sector-78 Noida are Mahagun Group, Antriksh Group, Nimbus and IITL Group & Sikka Group
Key highways, such as Noida-Greater Noida Expressway and FNG Expressway, are located 5-7 km from Sector-78 Noida
A slew of shopping malls, such as Logix City Center, Shopper's Mall, DLF The Mall of India and TGIP, fall within 10 km
Apart from the shopping malls, local markets, such as Atta Market and Brahmaputra Market, are 10 km away
The Manthan, Broadways International & Delhi Public School are some of the schools around Sector-78 Noida
Sector-78 is only 5-6 km from Shivalik Hospital, Neo Hospital and Surbhi Hospital
About 25 km from Hazrat Nizamuddin Railway Station via Vishwakarma Road
Indira Gandhi International Airport is about 36 km from Sector-78 Noida via Baba Banda Singh Bahadur
Improper waste disposal system is a major issue reported by the residents of Sector-78 Noida
Inadequate landscaping and ongoing construction work result in dust pollution in this sector
Residents of Sector-78 Noida raise concern over growing incidents of theft due to limited police patrolling
Several potholes and uneven roads make commutation more challenging in Sector-78 Noida
Heavy rains leave Vishwakarma Road waterlogged & increase travelling time towards the sector
